Authors:
Napalai Chaiwan, Dhanushka Nadeeshan Wanasinghe, Erio
Camporesi, Saowaluck Tibpromma, Saranyaphat Boonmee, Saisamorn Lumyong,
Kevin D Hyde
Title:
Multi-gene phylogenetic classification and morphological
delineation of Nodulosphaeriacampanulae-trachelii sp. nov.
Abstract:
A new species of Nodulosphaeria was collected from stems
of Campanula trachelium in Arezzo Province, Italy and is the first
record of Nodulosphaeria species on Campanulaceae. Combined analyses of
ITS, SSU and LSU sequence data obtained from the cultures derived from
single spore isolates indicated that our new species belongs to
Nodulosphaeria with a close affinity to N. multiseptata and N.
guttulatum. We therefore introduce Nodulosphaeria campanulae-trachelii
as a new species with description and illustrations are provided and
compared it with similar taxa in Nodulosphaeria.
